authors: A collection derived from the web community (Reddit,Pinterest,DmsGuild,ecc.). For credits, authors are provided with a web link in the entity description

entries: Most monsters are more frightening when they skitter unseen in the dark. Most.

Grimdancers are creatures that lurk deep inside cave systems, feasting on any creature that dare venture in their territory.The lay webs which they use to sense their prey, before jumping on them, the kill is swift. It is said that elder grimdancers can even merge with shadows and vanish.

The legs of a Grimdancer are sharp blades, coated with a unique poison that corrodes the skin at a touch. Their fangs contain a potent paralysing poison. Despite their formidable strength, adventurers still venture to challenge them. Indeed the blade on their legs can be forged into unique and powerful weapons. This holds truer for Elder Grimdancer.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The grimdancer has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The grimdancer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the grimdancer has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the grimdancer knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The grimdancer ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grimdancer makes three attacks, two with its Slash and one with its Bite.

action.name: Leaping Strike (Once per short or long rest)
entries: After falling under half its maximum HP, The grimdancer can leap towards up to 3 creatures within 60ft of it. It makes two Slash attack against each target. It leaps back and forth between each target, not triggering attacks of opportunity.

action.name: Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1}) piercing damage. The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 14} Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 10; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to biudgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage and the target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage on a failed save and be paralysed until the end of the grimdancer's next turn, or half as much damage on a successful one and not be paralysed. After succeeding on this saving throw a creature is immune to the paralysis effect from the grimdancer for 24h.

action.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage, plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) necrotic damage.
